name: Rusty goes Deep
description:
Rusty goes Deep

Darkness and fading fireflies all along.

  • Play as Rusty, the pumpkin guy, and follow the cruel Wizard deeper to forest to save the princess.
  • To navigate, eat delicious fireflies so you can see!
  • Once you eat the firefly it starts to fade away, so hurry!
  • Use keyboard arrows to run. Up or Space to jump.
  • Dont forget to use wall jump!
Notes:
  • Note that this is my first Game Jam so I made a decision to not draw my graphics but use free sprites instead. So please do not rate the graphics as I am not the one that created them :)
  • All I tried was to play with the idea that you see the whole picture in first 3 seconds and then wisely use the fading fireflies to navigate through the level. And I totally loved it!

Enjoy!

My Ludum Dare Jam #48 submission.
